food.question: I am round and juicy, and often red. Snow White is known to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I grow on trees.
🥧 I can be baked into a pie.
🐛 A worm might try to eat me.

food.question: I am long and yellow, and monkeys love to peel me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐒 I grow in bunches.
💛 My peel is the same color as the sun.
🍌 I am a very popular fruit.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or pour me on cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🥛 I am needed to make cheese.
🐄 I come from an animal with spots.
🍪 I'm good with cookies.

food.question: I am a vegetable that can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I grow underground.
🍔 I am a common addition to burgers
😢 Chefs might wear goggles when cutting me.

food.question: I am a grain that is fluffy and white when cooked. I am a staple food in many Asian countries. What am I?

hints.text: 🍚 I grow in water.
🥢 You often eat me with chopsticks.
🍛 I am often served with curry.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and a sweet green inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am not originally from New Zealand, but I'm grown there a lot.
🥄 You can easily eat me with a spoon.
🟩 I'm about the size of an egg.

food.question: I am made from flour, water, and yeast. I am baked in an oven and often sliced. What am I?

hints.text: 🍞 You can make sandwiches with me.
🥪 Toast is made from me.
🥖 I come in many shapes and sizes.

food.question: I am a long orange root vegetable. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am good for your eyesight.
💪 Bugs Bunny is often shown with me
🥕 I can be eaten raw or cooked.

food.question: I am a sweet treat that is frozen and comes in many flavors. What am I?

hints.text: 🍦 I melt if you leave me out in the sun.
🍧 I am often served in a cone or a cup.
🍨 I'm a common dessert on hot days.

food.question: I am a food made from fermented soybeans. I can be firm or silken. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am often used in vegetarian and vegan dishes.
🧊 I am sometimes found in miso soup.
🥢 I'm popular in Asian cuisine.

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love sweet things. What am I?

hints.text: 🍯 I like to visit picnics.
I can sting if threatened.
💛 I am often black and yellow.

bug.question: I crawl on plants and munch, then wrap myself in a cozy bunch. I change into something beautiful!

hints.text: 🌿 I love to eat leaves.
🛌 I sleep in a chrysalis.
🦋 I grow wings.

bug.question: I hop and jump with strong back legs and I love to eat plants and make chirping sounds. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I eat plants.
🎵 I chirp in the summer.
🟢 I am usually green.

bug.question: I carry heavy loads and live in colonies. I am very strong for my size! What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I work hard.
🏡 I live in a hill or underground.
🐜 I am very small.

bug.question: I have bright spots and bring good luck, or so they say! I love to eat aphids on plants. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I have spots.
🌱 I help gardens grow.
🔴 I am often red.

bug.question: I light up the night with a soft, gentle glow. You might catch me in a jar but you should always let me go! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I shine.
🌙 I am active at night.
💡 I produce my own light.

bug.question: I make a sticky web to catch my prey, I have 8 legs and like to hide away. What am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I make webs.
🕷️ I am an arachnid.
🕸️ I catch food with sticky traps.

bug.question: I am a master of disguise, blending in with leaves and twigs. I can be hard to spot if you don't look close. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I look like a part of a tree.
🌳 My body is long and slender.
🌿 I am a good at camouflage.

bug.question: I play a song that vibrates to attract mates, often mistaken for the sound of summer heat. I live underground as a nymph for years! What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 I make a loud buzzing sound.
☀️ I am most active in the summer.
🌱 I spend most of my life underground as a nymph.

bug.question: I am a hard-shelled creature that can roll into a ball for defense. You might find me in gardens or under rocks. What am I?

hints.text: 🛡️ I can protect myself.
⚽ I can roll up into a ball.
🪨 I live under rocks and logs.
